statements: SELECT * FROM public_opinion_survey;
SELECT survey_id, voter_name FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE political_party = 'Democratic';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE issue_1_sentiment > 3;
SELECT voter_name, issue_1_sentiment FROM public_opinion_survey ORDER BY issue_1_sentiment DESC;
SELECT voter_name, political_party FROM public_opinion_survey ORDER BY voter_name ASC, political_party DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name, political_party FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE issue_1_sentiment > 0;
SELECT survey_id, voter_name, political_party FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE issue_1_sentiment < 0 AND issue_2_sentiment > 0;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE issue_1_sentiment = 1 OR issue_2_sentiment = -1;
SELECT survey_id, voter_name FROM public_opinion_survey WHERE political_party = 'Democrat';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE political_issue = 'Climate Change' AND response = 'Agree';
SELECT survey_date, political_issue FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_id = '2a071a1d-6e67-4c89-899b-23c8e9f2fa3a';
SELECT political_issue, COUNT(*) as total_responses FROM public_opinion_surveys GROUP BY political_issue;
SELECT voter_id, sentiment_score FROM voter_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC, survey_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT survey_id, voter_id, response FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE political_issue = 'Healthcare' AND response = 'Favorable' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, political_issue, response FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE response IN ('Favorable', 'Neutral') LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS survey_count FROM public_opinion_surveys GROUP BY voter_id ORDER BY survey_count DESC;

SELECT voter_sentiment.*, public_opinion_surveys.political_issue FROM voter_sentiment JOIN public_opinion_surveys ON voter_sentiment.issue_id = public_opinion_surveys.survey_id WHERE voter_sentiment.sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY voter_sentiment.sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT voter_id, political_party, opinion_1 FROM survey_data;
SELECT voter_name, age, gender FROM voter_info;
SELECT * FROM political_issues WHERE opinion_rating > 3;
SELECT issue_topic, opinion_rating FROM political_issues ORDER BY opinion_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE political_party='Democratic' AND opinion_1='Agree' ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, political_party, opinion_1, opinion_2 FROM survey_data WHERE opinion_2='Disagree' ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT voter_name, age, gender, political_party FROM voter_info INNER JOIN survey_data ON voter_info.voter_id = survey_data.voter_id ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT issue_topic, opinion_rating FROM political_issues WHERE opinion_rating > 3 ORDER BY opinion_rating DESC, issue_id ASC;

SELECT voter_name, issue_topic, opinion_1, opinion_2 FROM voter_info INNER JOIN survey_data ON voter_info.voter_id = survey_data.voter_id INNER JOIN political_issues ON survey_data.opinion_2 = political_issues.issue_topic WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY issue_id ASC;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, age, party_affiliation FROM voters;
SELECT issue_id, issue_name, issue_description FROM issues;
SELECT voter_id, age, party_affiliation, voter_name FROM voters;
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_leader FROM political_parties;
SELECT response_id, voter_id, issue_id, response FROM survey_responses;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters;
SELECT issue_id, issue_name, issue_description FROM issues WHERE issue_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT voter_id, age, party_affiliation FROM voters WHERE age >= 18 AND party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_leader FROM political_parties ORDER BY party_name DESC;
SELECT voter_name, issue_name, response FROM voters JOIN survey_responses ON voters.voter_id = survey_responses.voter_id JOIN issues ON survey_responses.issue_id = issues.issue_id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyParticipants;
SELECT count(*) AS total_participants FROM SurveyParticipants;
SELECT participant_id, age, gender FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE location='New York';
SELECT issue_title, issue_description FROM PoliticalIssues ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE issue_id=1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC, location ASC

SELECT sp.participant_id, sp.age, sr.response_text, ps.issue_title FROM SurveyParticipants sp JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON sp.participant_id = sr.participant_id JOIN PoliticalIssues ps ON sr.issue_id = ps.issue_id WHERE sp.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY sp.age ASC

SELECT sp.participant_id, sp.gender, vs.sentiment_score, sr.response_text FROM SurveyParticipants sp LEFT JOIN VoterSentiment vs ON sp.participant_id = vs.participant_id LEFT JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON sp.participant_id = sr.participant_id WHERE vs.sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY sp.gender ASC, vs.sentiment_score DESC

SELECT ps.issue_title, ps.issue_description, SUM(sr.agree_count) AS total_agree, SUM(sr.disagree_count) AS total_disagree FROM PoliticalIssues ps JOIN SurveyResults sr ON ps.issue_id = sr.issue_id GROUP BY ps.issue_title, ps.issue_description ORDER BY total_agree DESC, total_disagree ASC

SELECT sp.*, sr.response_date, vs.sentiment_date FROM SurveyParticipants sp JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON sp.participant_id = sr.participant_id LEFT JOIN VoterSentiment vs ON sp.participant_id = vs.participant_id WHERE sr.response_date IS NOT NULL AND vs.sentiment_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sr.response_date DESC, vs.sentiment_date DESC
